attributes.action: Change the Law so you don’t get taxed on tips in hospitality
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to abolish the law so we don’t get taxed on them anymore
attributes.background: I think it’s an absolute disgrace that we should get taxed on our tips that customers have have us because of good service

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/712667
